availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph H. Davis (Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer and lieut 7th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Davis and Mary Davis. Farmer in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant and first lieutenant from August 20, 1861, to August 5, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, District 2, p. 248.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0211.
